physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Physical examination revealed erythema, painful and crusted perforated ulcers, white atrophy, and small white atrophic scars around the ankle area and lower extremities.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: The patient showed progressive and rapid improvement of pain, erythema, and wounding after 2 weeks, with almost complete remission of LV achieved after the third dose of treatment.
